participant_1.background:
I've never been arrested, but I would love to travel the world and play music like my brother.
I am known for my talents and my love of my family.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.
i just bought a new house with my partner.
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.

participant_2.background:
My ethnicity is not related to my job or my beliefs about the moon landing.
I have a student id and hate paying my bills.
I love to make sure my pets are happy and healthy.
I prefer to be comfortable and not draw much attention to myself.
my mom and dad are both red headed.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing great! I just bought a new house with my partner.
That's awesome! Congratulations!
Thanks! We're really excited about it.
I'm sure you will love it! I just got a new student ID, so I'm excited to start my new semester.
That's great! What are you studying?
I'm studying music. I want to be a musician like my brother.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it. I'm not much of a musician myself, but I love listening to music.
Me too! What's your favorite genre?
I like a little bit of everything, but I'm really into country music right now.
Country music is great! I love the way it makes me feel.
Me too! I think it's the perfect music to relax to.
I agree! I love listening to country music when I'm working on a project.
That's a great idea! I'm going to have to try that.
You should! I think you'll like it.
I'm sure I will. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good day!
You too
